title: Stylish North Island Coastal Retreat with 18-Hole Championship Golf Course
description: Swing into the sublime with a stay at Rydges Formosa Golf Resort, just 40 minutes from Auckland. The resort offers majestic views of the dramatic Hauraki Gulf, Waiheke Island, Rangitoto Island and the Coromandel Peninsula from its sprawling clifftop and has the putting pedigree to match - tee off across its acclaimed world-class 18-hole championship golf course or master the perfect swing at the undercover driving range.
offer_address: 110 Jack Lachlan Drive, Beachlands 2571, New Zealand
